channel.title: Your opinions on the new sound pack “found sounds from mars”?
channel.description:
about 5 minutes ago auxy released a new sound pack “found sounds from mars” which contains 140+ samples with organic sounds, some vocals, ambiance and more! these are really great for texturing.
what are your thoughts about it? i honestly liked :)
here’s a demo project link in case if you didn’t heard it yet https://app.auxy.co/projects/vpcptcuzAmaDSlH4y04p-w==

item.title: Your opinions on the new sound pack “found sounds from mars”?
item.dc:creator: AzureOnyx
item.description:
I rarely use drum samples since there’s a lot for me to choose, kinda disappointed it’s not another melodic pack, though with the recent selection of melodic samples, this month is just as equal as the last couple of months, not to be rude.

Read full topic
item.source: Your opinions on the new sound pack “found sounds from mars”?
